questions.description: You can monitor the status of UCP by using the web UI or the CLI. True or false?
Which of the following items need to be considered before installing Docker Enterprise?
answers: Docker Engine, DTR, and UCP version compatibility

questions.description: What is the docker command to see container logs?
Which of the following tool to use to create users and teams?
What is the endpoint that we can use to check the health of a single UCP manager node?
What is the correct order to upgrade a Docker cluster?
answers: Upgrade UCP, DTR, then engine and kernel
Upgrade engine and kernel, DTR, and then UCP
Upgrade DTR, UCP, then engine and kernel
Upgrade engine and kernel, UCP, and then DTR

questions.description: What is the docker command to find the current logging driver for a running container?
What is the recommended approach to set storage driver?
answers: Set the 'storage-driver' option in the daemon.json file

questions.description: What is the docker command to add a node to a swarm?
What is the correct order to backup Docker EE components?
answers: Back up UCP, swarm, then DTR
Back up DTR, UCP, then swarm
Back up swarm, DTR, then UCP
Back up swarm, UCP, then DTR

questions.description: What is the docker command to see the storage driver Docker is currently using?
What is the docker command to backup the UCP?
What is the docker command to setup a swarm?
How to configure the default logging driver?
answers: Set the 'log-driver' option in the daemon.json file
